content.query:
SELECT * FROM silver.silverTable

------------------------
------DIMCUSTOMERS------
------------------------

IF NOT EXISTS (  SELECT *  FROM sys.tables t JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
                    WHERE t.name = 'DimCustomers' AND s.name = 'gold')
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.DimCustomers
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'DimCustomers',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format
    )
    AS
    SELECT
        DISTINCT
        CustomerID,
        CustomerName,
        CustomerEmail,
        Domain,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CustomerID) as DimCust
    FROM
        silver.silverTable

------------------------
------DIMPRODUCTS------
------------------------

IF NOT EXISTS (  SELECT *  FROM sys.tables t JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
                    WHERE t.name = 'DimProducts' AND s.name = 'gold')
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.DimProducts
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'DimProducts',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format
    )
    AS
    SELECT
        DISTINCT
        ProductID,
        ProductName,
        ProductCategory,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ProductID) as DimProd
    FROM
        silver.silverTable
    
------------------------
------DimRegion------
------------------------

IF NOT EXISTS (  SELECT *  FROM sys.tables t JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
                    WHERE t.name = 'DimRegion' AND s.name = 'gold')
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.DimRegion
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'DimRegion',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format
    )
    AS
    SELECT
        DISTINCT
        RegionID,
        RegionName,
        Country,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ProductID) as DimGeog
    FROM
        silver.silverTable

------------------------
------DimOrders------
------------------------

IF NOT EXISTS (  SELECT *  FROM sys.tables t JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
                    WHERE t.name = 'DimOrders' AND s.name = 'gold')
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.DimOrders
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'DimOrders',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format
    )
    AS
    SELECT
        OrderID,
        OrderDate,
        CustomerID,
        CustomerName,
        CustomerEmail,
        Domain,
        ProductID,
        ProductName,
        ProductCategory,
        RegionID,
        RegionName,
        Country,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY OrderID) as DimOrders
    FROM
        silver.silverTable
